# Afterlogic WebMail Lite PHP

Fast and easy-to-use webmail front-end for your existing IMAP mail server, Plesk or cPanel.

![Afterlogic WebMail Lite PHP: Message list](https://afterlogic.org/images/products/wmlp/screenshots/mails.png)

## Useful links
- [Product's home page](https://afterlogic.org/webmail-lite)
- [Live demo](https://lite.afterlogic.com/)
- [Online documentation](https://afterlogic.com/docs/webmail-lite/)
- [Installation instructions](https://afterlogic.com/docs/webmail-lite/installation/installation-instructions)
